position.marginalia_text: Pol: If you call me, Jeptha, my Lord, I | have a daughter that I love passing well | Ham. Nay, that follows not. [Deleted]

substitution.copyText: Ros. I think their inhibition comes by the means of the late innovation.
the same estimation they did when I was in the City?
substitution.amendedText: the same estimation they did, when I was in the City?

substitution.copyText: Ham. It is not very strange, for my Uncle is King of Denmark, and those that would make mouths at him while my father, lived, give twenty, forty, fifty, a hundred duckets a piece for his picture in little
substitution.amendedText: Ham. It is not very strange; for my Uncle is King of Denmark; and those that would make mouths at him while my father, lived, now [deleted] give twenty, forty, fifty, nay a hundred duckets a piece for his picture in little

substitution.copyText: Ham. Gentlemen you are welcome to Elsenour, your hands: come then, th'appurtenance of welcome is fashion and ceremony, let me comply with you in this garb, " left my extent to the Players " which I tell you must shew fairly outwards, should more " appear like entertainment than yours; you are welocome:
substitution.amendedText: Ham. Gentlemen you are welcome to Elsenour; your hands: the appurtenance of welcome is fashion and ceremony,

substitution.copyText: Ham. I am but mad North-North-west, when the wind is Southerly I know a hawk from a hand saw.
substitution.amendedText: Ham. I am but mad North, North-west, when the wind is Southerly, I know a hawk from a Hernsaw.

substitution.copyText: Pol. Well be with you Gentlemen.
Hark you Guildenstern, and you too, at each ear a hearer, that great baby as you see is not yet out of his swadling clouts.
substitution.amendedText: Hark you Guildenstern, and Rosencraus, that great baby you see yonder is not yet out of his swadling clouts.

substitution.copyText: Ham. I will prophesie that he comes to tell me of the Players, mark it: You say right Sir, Monday morning 'twas then indeed.
substitution.amendedText: Ham. I will prophesie that he comes to tell me of the Players, mark it -- YOu say right, Sir; for on Monday morning 'twas then, indeed.

substitution.copyText: My Lord I have news to tell you: when Rossius was an Actor in Rome.
substitution.amendedText: My Lord, I have news to tell you: when Rossius was an Actor in Rome. --

substitution.copyText: Ham. Then came each Actor on his Ass.
substitution.amendedText: Ham. Then came each actor on his Ass--

substitution.copyText: Ham. O Jeptha Judge of Israel what a treasure hadst thou.
substitution.amendedText: Ham. O jeptha Judge of Israel what a treasure hadst thou!

substitution.copyText: Ham. Why one fair daughter and no more,
substitution.amendedText: Ham. Why, one fair daughter and no more,
